data.text: @Sambannz @MinofHealthUG these are satisfied thieves just mbu they are administrators

@Sambannz @MinofHealthUG They arrested the Dr coz he knows alot. Am just wondering Dr Atwine dis obeyed the Predlsident during Covid-19 lockdown period 4 not procuring enough ICU beds ...but she was not arrested or fired.....hypocrites

@Sambannz @MinofHealthUG We must be less impressionable if we are to avoid the fate of other countries that have had dictatorships. While keeping in mind that almost always, almost everyone pays for a dictator's transgressions. Those closest to the regime, in particular.

@Sambannz @MinofHealthUG The reality is that this is a crony state that has been captured, and a position like his, given the amount of funding involved, would pique the interest of vultures. Some of them have a long reach. As a result, getting things running smoothly necessitates getting dirty.

@Sambannz @MinofHealthUG At best this man is small fish, whose stellar portfolio has been damaged by those who failed(ATWINE). The reality is this is a forward thinking civil servant who has overseen the modernisation of an archaic hospital. And has been vindicated by a public so keen on everything free

@Sambannz @MinofHealthUG In absence of direct evidence on this controverted issue, that has clearly excited many minds, the statement from that illegal entity- the mafia group that is aka "palace monitoring group" is at best all circumstancial. This is in-house vendetta.
@EnochWilliams @Sambannz @MinofHealthUG Are very certain about this story.

@Sambannz @MinofHealthUG I saw something bigger here. The accusers and the accused all have issues to tell Ugandans' in as far as accountabilities are concerned. 
The exposure of part of their dirt here is part of the iceberg. More awaits.
